summary:
This mod adds a Beautiful Female Nord follower named Bri. She is 99% stand alone, (except her hair), so she should look exactly as shown. (Warning, comes with nude skin.)
She is Modeled after the Player Character of my good friend "Bri01".
Available in Full and Light resolutions
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=yellow]WARNING[/color][/size][b][color=yellow], Requires Skyrim version 1.8 or higher.....[/color] [size=3][color=yellow]WARNING NSFW[/color][/size][color=yellow], Comes equipped with a nude body skin (CBBEv3)[/color]

On a side note: If you like a mod, any mod, please come back to endorse it. Appreciation is a wonderful motivator for modders.[/b]

[b][size=3]Now Available,[/size] [size=4]"Bri, for Bri's Home Edition"[/size][/b][color=yellow]
Note: The Newer "Bri - for Bri's Home Edition" also requires "Bri's Home"[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789[/url]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31742-4-1372690091.jpg[/img]

[b][size=3]Introducing the Beautiful but Deadly,[/size] [size=4]"Bri"[/size][/b]

[b]Description:[/b]
This mod adds a Beautiful Female Nord follower named Bri. [color=green]She is 99% stand alone[/color], (except her hair - requires Apachii), so she should look exactly as shown.
[color=yellow][size=3]Note: The Newer "Bri - for Bri's Home Edition" also requires "Bri's Home"[/size][/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789[/url]
She is Modeled after the Player Character of my good friend "Bri01". (at her request)
She is a combat ranger, fighting type "human missile"
She has some spells but should default to bow at range, and 1hand + shield up close.
She is both a potential follower and a potential spouse.
She comes with (skimpy) hide armor, bracers, & boots, and a shield.
She comes with a bow, some arrows and a sword (all Elvin)
Available in Full(aka 4k body, 1k head/hands, etc..) and Light(aka Vanilla, 2k body, 0.5k head/hands) resolutions

[b]Location:[/b]
Bri can be found hunting for her dinner, just off the road NE from "Battle-Born Farm" (that's east of whiterun)
(See Screen Shot of map)
[color=yellow][size=3]Note: Users of The Newer "Bri - for Bri's Home Edition", will receive a quest that will lead you to her.
(don't forget to activate the quest in your journal)[/size][/color]
*Users of BBLS will find her at the base of the ramp leading from the back patio*

Planned additions, [s]Coming Soon:[/s][b]Now Available:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789]"Bri's Home"[/url]...A lady needs a roof and a closet, right?... (very) loosely based off Breezhome
(yes, the pun was very much intended),
and featuring some of the finest "Modders resources" from several under-used/appreciated artists.

Change log:
V2.5e
- fixed "Bri gets naked every time I change cells" bug
- fixed some scripts to allow better interaction between Bri's clothing dialogs, and those of other follower mods like EFF.

V2.5 (Bri for Bri's Home Edition)
- Added "Weather Checks" So Bri wont sandbox in garden when raining nor sandbox at the beach if it's raining or cloudy.
(she will sandbox upstairs in these cases.)

V2.0 (Bri for Bri's Home Edition)
- Added Intro Quest. (To make Bri & Bri's Home easy to find)
- Added Highly detailed, (and as realistic as possible) daily schedule for Bri's day.
(Bri will perform as many as 5 tasks within a 15 min period). *15 min game time*
- Added 4 more outfits for Bri to wear during the course of her day.
- Added Dialog so Bri can be told to wear these outfits while following
(also placed these outfits in the gothic dresser for PC use)

v 1.2
Corrected Bri's status, She is now essential, not invulnerable. (as intended)

v 1.1 (No new content!)
Optimized texture files of Bri_Full (5,619kb shaved off zip size, 92,472kb shaved off extracted files)
Added Bri_Light for those who cant handle the full resolutions of Bri_Full
Optimized texture files of Bri_Light (3,100kb shaved off zip size, 18,700kb shaved off extracted files)

v 1.0
Initial release

[b][color=red]Required Files:[/color][/b]
"ApachiiSkyHair", (ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]
[b][color=red]Additional Required Files for "Bri - for Bri's Home Edition:[/color][/b]
"Bri's Home", [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37789[/url]

[b]Installation:[/b] (if upgrading see next paragraph)
Best is to install via NMM,
But for manual install;
Extract the Contents of the "Data" folder to, your skyrimData directory, (typically, C:ProgramfilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData)
Insure Bri.esp, Is turned on.

[b]Upgrading from v1.2 to V2.1:[/b]
Users of the old Bri should...
1) take anything of value away from old Bri (save)
2) Start the game launcher and goto data file and turn off Bri.esp (or uninstall via NMM if used)
3) Run the game from last save (now without a Bri in it) and save.
4) Install the new Bri (insuring to goto data files and turn BRI.esp Back ON) and load in on the "No Bri save"
5) Give the New Bri back any Items you wish her to have, After completing the short quest)

[b]Uninstallation: [/b]
Best is to remove via NMM,
but for manual uninstall Remove;
Bri.esp, from skyrimData
the folder skyrimDatameshesactorscharacterAlt bodyBri
the folder skyrimDatameshesactorscharacterAlt bodyfacegendatafacegeomBri.esp
the folder skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterBri
the folder skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintBri.esp

[b]Incompatibilities:[/b]
None identified yet.

[b]F.A.Q.[/b]

Q: If I'm upgrading from "Bri v1.2" to "Bri - for Bri's Home v2.1", What is the safest way?
A:Users of the old Bri should...
1) take anything of value away from old Bri (save)
2) Start the game launcher and goto data file and turn off Bri.esp (or uninstall via NMM if used)
3) Run the game from last save (now without a Bri in it) and save.
4) Install the new Bri (insuring to goto data files and turn BRI.esp Back ON) and load in on the "No Bri save"
5) Give the New Bri back any Items you wish her to have, After completing the short quest)

Q: I just upgrade from "Bri v1.2" to "Bri - for Bri's Home v2.1", and now my game crashes. Why?
A: "Bri - for Bri's Home v2.1", has an additional requirement..."Bri's Home" available HERE

Q: I want "Bri" but I dont want to have "Bri's Home", is this possible.
A: yes, I left the older "Bri v1.2" in the optional downloads section for anyone who just wants "Bri".

Q: When I put some of the Outfits from the gothic dresser on my Player Character, they clip. Why?
A: The bikini, Bra & Panties, and Coverups, require you also wear the "Bri's Naked skin" (available in same dresser) in order to have the correct body shape.

Q: I'm useing the new "Bri - for Bri's Home v2.1", and "Bri's Home", but Bri seem "out of Sync" with the house. (Ie, she went to cook lunch and put the fire out first.)
A; Her schedule is very detailed, but has no way to know if you have "skiped time", "just returned from adventuring", or "just started the mod"...Everything will correct itself as her day cycles. (alternately, most items have a manuel overide, if you wish to fix the issue yourself)

[b]Tools Used:[/b]
Photoshop
Nifscope
TESsnip
TESVedit (this mod has already been cleaned by it author)
Creation Kit

[b]Permissions:
Anyone is free to use anything that I have made for NON COMERCIAL use ONLY.
However, most of my work is based in some way off a stock Bethesda mesh or texture, so keep it in this game please.
Many of the assets in this file are NOT mine but are used by permission so please contact me before attempting to use any assets from this mod.
Credits to those I have credited should be passed forward, of course. If using just parts, you can contact me for what credits should be passed on with what parts.

Nobody may upload my mod to any other sites, Repackage and claim it as their work, Profit from the use of "the mod in whole" or any of its assets, or restrict others from using ("their works" "based on my parts"). its just a game folks, lets keep it fun.[/b]
